name: Tomorrow for Searx
description:
Tomorrow is a simple dark color theme built upon Oscar front-end for Searx.
This theme works with the new and the old (from Searx 0.8 to 14.0) instances.

Deprecated
As the version 13 of Sears bought a official dark option this theme is not being maintained anymore. It can still be useful for instances of Search using an old version.

Some of the supported instances:
searx.me
searx.de
searx.info
laquadrature.net
s3arch.eu
koehn.com
brihx.fr
oe5tpo.com

You can check this page for more options.
additional_info: --february 19, 2018-- Theme deprecated. Tested up to Searx 14.0 --June 29, 2017-- More fidelity to the Tomorrow color palette. Added support to the stats page. --June 13, 2017-- Compatibility hotfix for the image light-box. --Mar 17, 2017-- Compatibility hotfix for Searx 0.11 --Nov 25, 2016-- Further support for the new Oscar theme. Added more Searx instances. --Aug 3, 2016-- Initial support for the new default theme. It is still compatible with the old theme. --Jun 1, 2016-- Minor improvement for image thumbs and preview, added more Searx instances. --Apt 9, 2016-- Minor improvements, better support for Preferences page.
